direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve orders but getOrders retrieves all orders while getOpenOrders retrieves only open orders.
Both methods involve order management and use similar parameter checking and request handling structures.
Both methods interact with the order management API endpoints and handle similar types of parameters.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the RequestHandler to be initialized with the necessary credentials and configurations.
Environment setup is required before interacting with the order management endpoints.
Both methods involve verifying order statuses and handling similar exceptions.
